export function ApiCalls(url,method,data){debugger;console.log(url,method,data);var requestOptions={method:method,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};if(data){requestOptions.body=JSON.stringify(data);}return fetch(url,requestOptions).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Request failed with status: ".concat(response.status));}return response.json();}).then(function(responseData){console.log(responseData);return responseData;// Return the data to be used elsewhere
}).catch(function(error){console.error("API call error:",error);throw error;});}
